message.body: Oh my goodness I love it...gorgeous. What are you thinking now that you have two pretty dresses?!
I think I like the new one better! I think it's more flattering for my body and more...bridal? Like it feels more special, if that makes sense haha
What do you think? Which do you like better?? (There's no right or wrong answer haha)

I agree, the new one is stunning! And I think you will be glad that your dress is long...it will look so great with all the bridesmaids dresses. Also it is very Faye so goes with the theme! I love it.
